subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury and the Knicks shut down Gilbert Arenas, but Caron Butler scored 27 points and Antawn Jamison added 21 as the Wizards beat the Knicks on Wednesday night.
snippet: Stephon Marbury and the Knicks shut down Gilbert Arenas, but Caron Butler scored 27 points and Antawn Jamison added 21 as the Wizards beat the Knicks on Wednesday night.
